java -Xms4G -Xmx<MEM>G -jar run/MORecommenderSystem.jar EvaluationRunner  <BD>/  BD/  u.item.attributes  Sample<TRAIN>  Sample<TEST>.top  Predictions/<R>-Top/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/  ""  "Predictions/hybrid/<R>-Top/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/"  ".tsv.sorted"  Results/<R>-Top/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>  tsv  <RELEVANT>  <TOP_N>  LogarithmicDiscountModel  <CORES_MAIN>  "1;2;3;4:alpha=5;5:alpha=5;6:alpha=5"  >  <OUT>-<TOP_N>-<R>-F<TRAIN>-<TEST>_TOP.out
java -Xms4G -Xmx<MEM>G -jar run/MORecommenderSystem.jar EvaluationRunner  <BD>/  BD/  u.item.attributes  Sample<TRAIN>  Sample<TEST>.bot  Predictions/<R>-Bot/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/  ""  "Predictions/hybrid/<R>-Bot/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/"  ".tsv.sorted"  Results/<R>-Bot/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>  tsv  <RELEVANT>  <TOP_N>  LogarithmicDiscountModel  <CORES_MAIN>  "1;2;3;4:alpha=5;5:alpha=5;6:alpha=5"  >  <OUT>-<TOP_N>-<R>-F<TRAIN>-<TEST>_BOT.out
